languages.text: {n}Сквозь кровожадное равнодушие на лице пробивается нечто, похожее на живую эмоцию. Сквозь искривленные оскалом губы пробивается:{/n} "За... Всеотца..."

{n}From beneath the veneer of bloodthirsty indifference, something resembling a living emotion surfaces on the giant's face. You hear words breaking through the wall of bared teeth:{/n} "For... the... Allfather..."
languages.original_text: {n}Сквозь кровожадное равнодушие на лице пробивается нечто, похожее на живую эмоцию. Сквозь искривленные оскалом губы пробивается:{/n} "За... Всеотца..."

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}From beneath the veneer of bloodthirsty indifference, something resembling a living emotion surfaces on the giant's face. You hear words breaking through the wall of bared teeth:{/n} "For... the... Allfather..."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sous le masque d'indifférence assoiffée de sang du géant, vous remarquez quelque chose évoquant une véritable émotion. Des mots tentent de s'échapper de sa bouche aux dents acérées :{/n} « Pour... le... Père de Tous... »
languages.original_text: {n}From beneath the veneer of bloodthirsty indifference, something resembling a living emotion surfaces on the giant's face. You hear words breaking through the wall of bared teeth:{/n} "For... the... Allfather..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sous le masque d'indifférence assoiffée de sang du géant, vous remarquez quelque chose évoquant une véritable émotion. Des mots tentent de s'échapper de sa bouche aux dents acérées :{/n} « Pour... le... Père de Tous... »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}眼前这个巨人嗜血、冷漠的外表之下，似乎浮现出了某种活人的情感。你听到他尖锐的齿间似乎传来了这样的话语。{/n}“为……了……全父……”
languages.original_text: {n}From beneath the veneer of bloodthirsty indifference, something resembling a living emotion surfaces on the giant's face. You hear words breaking through the wall of bared teeth:{/n} "For... the... Allfather..."

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前这个巨人嗜血、冷漠的外表之下，似乎出现了某种活人的情感。你听到他尖锐的齿间似乎传来了这样的话语。{/n}“为……了……全父……”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}残忍で冷淡に見えた巨人の表情の下から、高ぶった感情らしきものが現れてきた。むき出しの歯を突き破るような言葉が聞こえてくる。{/n}「全知の…父の…ために…」
languages.original_text: {n}From beneath the veneer of bloodthirsty indifference, something resembling a living emotion surfaces on the giant's face. You hear words breaking through the wall of bared teeth:{/n} "For... the... Allfather..."

traits.locale_text: {n}残忍で冷淡に見えた巨人の表情の下から、高ぶった感情らしきものが現れてきた。むき出しの歯を突き破るような言葉が聞こえてくる。{/n}「全知の…父の…ために…」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Unter der Fassade seiner blutrünstigen Gleichgültigkeit zeichnet sich im Gesicht des Riesen etwas Lebendiges ab. Auf seinem Mund mit entblößten Zähnen kommen folgende Worte:{/n} "Für ... den ... Allvater ..."
languages.original_text: {n}From beneath the veneer of bloodthirsty indifference, something resembling a living emotion surfaces on the giant's face. You hear words breaking through the wall of bared teeth:{/n} "For... the... Allfather..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Unter der Fassade seiner blutrünstigen Gleichgültigkeit zeichnet sich im Gesicht des Riesen etwas Lebendiges ab. Auf seinem Mund mit entblößten Zähnen kommen folgende Worte:{/n} "Für ... den ... Allvater ..."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bajo la apariencia de sanguinaria indiferencia, algo parecido a una emoción aflora en el rostro del gigante. Oyes algunas palabras que atraviesan el muro de sus dientes apretados:{/n} «Por... el... Padre... de Todo...».
languages.original_text: {n}From beneath the veneer of bloodthirsty indifference, something resembling a living emotion surfaces on the giant's face. You hear words breaking through the wall of bared teeth:{/n} "For... the... Allfather..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bajo la apariencia de sanguinaria indiferencia, algo parecido a una emoción asoma al rostro del gigante. Oyes algunas palabras que atraviesan el muro de sus dientes apretados:{/n} «Por... el... Padre... de Todo...».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Devin yüzünde, kana susamış bir lakayıtlık maskesinin ardından dirilen bir duygu beliriyor. Sıktığı sıra sıra dizilmiş dişlerinin arkasından bir çift kelime duyuluyor.{/n} "Yücebaba... İçin..."
languages.original_text: {n}From beneath the veneer of bloodthirsty indifference, something resembling a living emotion surfaces on the giant's face. You hear words breaking through the wall of bared teeth:{/n} "For... the... Allfather..."
